definition: adoptive mother (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: Sweet son died, XiaoRong fragrance did adopted mother.
sentences.chinese: 芬芳兒子夭折，曉榮認芬芳做了乾媽。

sentences.english: At the same time, the paper gives some recommendations to the brand strategy of Laoganma company .
sentences.chinese: 同時對“老乾媽”公司的品牌戰略提出了建議。

sentences.english: The second argument against surrogacy is that surrogate mother will be exploited. To be contrary.
sentences.chinese: 第二個論點反對代理孕母是乾媽會被人利用。

sentences.english: Heat two table spoons of Lao Gan Ma and some olive oil over low heat for a while.
sentences.chinese: 用低溫加熱一會兩湯匙的老乾媽和橄欖油的混合物。

definition: (of a singer) autograph session/record signing event
small shrimp/dried, shelled shrimps/(Tw) (coll.) what (from Taiwanese 啥物, Tai-lo pr. [siánn-mih], equivalent to Mandarin 什麼|什么[shen2 me5])
fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
